panel.name: fwAccessControl_ConfirmChangeGroup.pnl

description.html:p: This panel asks for confirmation of the changes in group settings performed in the panel. It is presented in Figure 1:

panel.instruction: Press the button; this will bring up the panel showing the list of changes performed. Once the Review Changes panel is closed you will go back to this panel.
panel.dollarParam: Text describing general changes, which will be passed to the panel (see the description of the $changes parameter for that panel)
The list of privileges that have been added for the group, which will be passed to the panel (see the description of the $addedItems parameter for that panel)
The list of privileges revoked from the group, which will be passed to the panel (see the description of the $removedItems parameter for that panel)

returns.description:
The panel should be opened using functions from the ChildPanel...Returns(... , df,ds) family.

returns.ds: not used: empty variable is always returned.
